realme-preference-error-invalid: Used as a validation error. $1 is the individual text line that does not pass URL validation.
realme-preference-error-not-http: Used as a validation error. $1 is the individual URL that does not pass validation and $2 is the used protocol, for example 'ftp://'.
realme-preference-error-too-many: Used as a validation error on Special:Preferences. $1 is the number of maximum allowed URLs.
realme-preference-help: Used as a preference help text.
realme-config-error-canonical: Used as a validation error when saving a page. $1 is the canonical/standard form that the user should specify, $2 is the title the user entered.
realme-config-error-invalidtitle: Used as a validation error when saving a page. $1 is the title the user specified that is invalid.
